MIDIPortOpen.summary: The open() method of the interface makes the MIDI device connected to this MIDIPort explicitly available.

remarks.para: If the port is successfully opened a new is queued to the and event handlers, and the property is changed to "open".
If the port is already open when this method is called, then the promise will resolve successfully.

MIDIPortOpen.returns: A which resolves once access to the port has been successfully obtained.
